questionTitle: Is there ________ bread for all the sandwiches we have to make?
Teaching is not a(n) ________ which pays very well.
No, the letter didn't come through the post. It was delivered personally, ________ hand.
I ________ do that if I were you.
There was nothing to ________ him with the burglary until the police found a gold ring in his car.
The manufacturers are advertising a new ________ of soap powder.
________ my stay in hospital, I lost twelve kilos.
I'm sorry to hear that Peter and Dick have ________. They were such a good friends.
Shall I use this ________ to fry the eggs?
He ________ being given a receipt for the bill he had paid.
These cars originally had two doors but the latest ________ has four.
That boy is far ahead ________ everyone else in the class.
He is also interested ________ art.
It is impossible to prevent them from quarreling ________ each other.
I'm thinking ________ looking for a new job.
Dick prefers football ________ tennis.
The internship in a psychiatric ward ________ for the rest of his life.
If I had known the way to his house, I ________ him last Friday afternoon.
He ________ that he had been involved in the decision not to attack the enemy position.
As brown as ________ = having a tanned skin after sunbathing.
